en.national_indicator_available:
• Inpatient treatment of substance use disorders
  • Estimate of high risk use (based on treatment entrants) of the substances opioids, cocaine, and other stimulants in the age group 15 to under 65 years
en.comparison_sdg:
The time series "Inpatient treatment of substance use disorders" is partly compliant with the global metadata.
The time series "Estimate of high risk use (based on treatment entrants) of the substances opioids, cocaine, and other stimulants in the age group 15 to under 65 years" provides additional information.
en.goal_meta_national_link_text: Metadata on the presented time series
en.indicator_name: Coverage of treatment interventions (pharmacological, psychosocial and rehabilitation and aftercare services) for substance use disorders
en.target_name: Strengthen the prevention and treatment of substance abuse, including narcotic drug abuse and harmful use of alcohol
en.un_designated_tier: Tier II
en.un_custodian_agency:
World Health Organization (WHO)
United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC)
en.source_organisation_1: Information System of the Federal Health Monitoring
en.source_organisation_2: German Monitoring Center for Drugs and Drug Addiction
en.source_url_text_2: The time series is a special evaluation based on the Annual Report of the National REITOX Focal Point to the EMCDDA, Workbook Drugs (only available in German).
